notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This research was funded by Fundação para a Ciência e a Tecnologia (FCT, Portugal), through projects UID/DTP/04567/2016, UIDP/04567/2020 and UIDB/04567/2020. E.M.D-M gratefully acknowledges being the recipient of a predoctoral FPU 2019 fellowship from the University of Alcalá de Henares.
